items.roadmap: on the roadmap, but not supported yet
items.third-party: reported by third-parties, but not supported
items.out-of-scope: out of the scope of the project

src.desc: whether the source code of the software application is available.

soft.desc: where is the software application to be executed.

items.a | arm: on an ARM device (either armv7, aarch32 or aarch4)
items.x | amd64: on an amd64 device (either amd64, x86_64 or i686)
items.u | user: built for ARM but executed on amd64 through QEMU user-mode
items.s | system: built for ARM but executed on amd64 through QEMU system-mode

hard.desc: where is the hardware accelerator to be executed.

items.a | arm: compiled HDL on an ARM device
items.x | amd64: compiled HDL on an amd64 device
items.p | PL: actually synthesised and implemented in the Programmable Logic (PL) of a SoC with an ARM core

items.hdbm: DBM with GHDL embedded in a plugin
items.dgrpc: DBM with gRPC client embedded in a plugin
